verses.verse: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵ֣י <WH335> Where זֶ֠ה <WH2088> he סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> Where [is] the bill כְּרִית֤וּת <WH3748> divorcement אִמְּכֶם֙ <WH517> of your mother's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שִׁלַּחְתִּ֔יהָ <WH7971> whom I have put away א֚וֹ <WH176> and מִ֣י <WH4310> to whom מִנּוֹשַׁ֔י <WH5383> ? or which of my creditors אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which מָכַ֥רְתִּי <WH4376> [is it] to whom I have sold אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> ל֑וֹ הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold בַּעֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5771> you? Behold for your iniquities נִמְכַּרְתֶּ֔ם <WH4376> have ye sold וּבְפִשְׁעֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6588> yourselves and for your transgressions שֻׁלְּחָ֥ה <WH7971> put away אִמְּכֶֽם׃ <WH517> is your mother

מַדּ֨וּעַ <WH4069> Why בָּ֜אתִי <WH935> Wherefore when I came וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> was there אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> man קָרָֽאתִי֮ <WH7121> bewray וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no עוֹנֶה֒ <WH6030> [was there] none to answer הֲקָצ֨וֹר <WH7114> shortened קָצְרָ֤ה <WH7114> at all יָדִי֙ <WH3027> ? Is my hand מִפְּד֔וּת <WH6304> division וְאִם־ <WH518> lo אֵֽין־ <WH369> was there בִּ֥י כֹ֖חַ <WH3581> power לְהַצִּ֑יל <WH5337> to deliver הֵ֣ן <WH2005> behold בְּגַעֲרָתִ֞י <WH1606> ? behold at my rebuke אַחֲרִ֣יב <WH2717> I dry up יָ֗ם <WH3220> the sea אָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> I make נְהָרוֹת֙ <WH5104> the rivers מִדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> a wilderness תִּבְאַ֤שׁ <WH887> stinketh דְּגָתָם֙ <WH1710> their fish מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> none מַ֔יִם <WH4325> because [there is] no water וְתָמֹ֖ת <WH4191> and dieth בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> for thirst
אַלְבִּ֥ישׁ <WH3847> I clothe שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> the heavens קַדְר֑וּת <WH6940> with blackness וְשַׂ֖ק <WH8242> sackcloth אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and I make כְּסוּתָֽם׃ <WH3682> their covering ס

אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> The Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD נָ֤תַן <WH5414> hath given לִי֙ לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> me the tongue לִמּוּדִ֔ים <WH3928> of the learned לָדַ֛עַת <WH3045> that I should know לָע֥וּת <WH5790> how to speak אֶת־ <WH853> יָעֵ֖ף <WH3287> in season to [him that is] weary דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> a word יָעִ֣יר ׀ <WH5782> he wakeneth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> morning בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> by morning יָעִ֥יר <WH5782> he wakeneth לִי֙ אֹ֔זֶן <WH241> mine ear לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> to hear כַּלִּמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH3928> as the learned

אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> The Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3068> GOD פָּתַֽח־ <WH6605> hath opened לִ֣י אֹ֔זֶן <WH241> mine ear וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor מָרִ֑יתִי <WH4784> and I was not rebellious אָח֖וֹר <WH268> back לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor נְסוּגֹֽתִי׃ <WH5472> neither turned away

גֵּוִי֙ <WH1460> my back נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> I gave לְמַכִּ֔ים <WH5221> to the smiters וּלְחָיַ֖י <WH3895> and my cheeks לְמֹֽרְטִ֑ים <WH4803> to them that plucked off פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> not my face לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הִסְתַּ֔רְתִּי <WH5641> the hair I hid מִכְּלִמּ֖וֹת <WH3639> from shame וָרֹֽק׃ <WH7536> and spitting

וַאדֹנָ֤י <WH136> For the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD יַֽעֲזָר־ <WH5826> will help לִ֔י עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that לֹ֣א <WH3808> I am not נִכְלָ֑מְתִּי <WH3637> me therefore shall I not be confounded עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that שַׂ֤מְתִּי <WH7760> therefore have I set פָנַי֙ <WH6440> my face כַּֽחַלָּמִ֔ישׁ <WH2496> like a flint וָאֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> and I know כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH954> that I shall not be ashamed

קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> [He is] near מַצְדִּיקִ֔י <WH6663> that justifieth מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יָרִ֥יב <WH7378> me who will contend אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for נַ֣עַמְדָה <WH5975> with me? let us stand יָּ֑חַד <WH3162> together מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who בַ֥עַל <WH1167> archer מִשְׁפָּטִ֖י <WH4941> adversary יִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> draw אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> Behold the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD יַֽעֲזָר־ <WH5826> will help לִ֔י מִי־ <WH4310> Who ה֖וּא <WH1931> who יַרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH7561> me who [is] he [that] shall condemn הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> will all כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> as a garment יִבְל֔וּ <WH1086> me? lo they all shall wax old עָ֖שׁ <WH6211> the moth יֹאכְלֵֽם׃ <WH398> shall eat them up

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who בָכֶם֙ יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> Who [is] among you that feareth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> that obeyeth בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> of his servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> that הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> that walketh חֲשֵׁכִ֗ים <WH2825> [in] darkness וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and has נֹ֙גַהּ֙ <WH5051> bright ל֔וֹ יִבְטַח֙ <WH982> be bold confident בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיִשָּׁעֵ֖ן <WH8172> and stay בֵּאלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> upon his God

הֵ֧ן <WH2005> Behold כֻּלְּכֶ֛ם <WH3605> all קֹ֥דְחֵי <WH6919> Behold all ye that kindle אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire מְאַזְּרֵ֣י <WH247> that compass [yourselves] about זִיק֑וֹת <WH2131> with sparks לְכ֣וּ ׀ <WH1980> Walk בְּא֣וּר <WH217> in the light אֶשְׁכֶ֗ם <WH784> of your fire וּבְזִיקוֹת֙ <WH2131> and in the sparks בִּֽעַרְתֶּ֔ם <WH1197> [that] ye have kindled מִיָּדִי֙ <WH3027> This shall ye have of mine hand הָיְתָה־ <WH1961> will have זֹּ֣את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֔ם לְמַעֲצֵבָ֖ה <WH4620> in sorrow תִּשְׁכָּבֽוּן׃ <WH7901> ye shall lie down פ
